entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
